alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued October 31 at 2:15PM EDT until November 01 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (4.6 to 4.8 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...Wednesday afternoon, especially around high tide. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property, especially on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 31/02 PM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 0.9/ 1.4 2 None 01/03 AM 3.6/ 4.1 0.0/ 0.5 0.8/ 1.3 2-3 None 01/03 PM 4.5/ 5.0 0.9/ 1.4 0.9/ 1.4 4 None 02/04 AM 3.7/ 4.2 0.1/ 0.6 1.0/ 1.5 3 None &&
info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
